Nice place to walk around and just relax in. There are free concerts And they are worth finding out about. It seems to be a focal point for the community.
Nice park in the center of the island. Public concerts and events during the summer, great change of pace when on vacation to kick back with others and enjoy. NOT a pet... read more

A very nice park for families, nice picnic area. Very nice play area for kids. Fun Fourth of July party.
Coronado's annual flower show was at the park during my visit... Lots of booths and exhibits and a book sale by the library.
